text: Adele is NOT ` ` panicked'' that her entourage might miss Sunday's Grammy Awards due to the East Coast snowstorm, despite a made - up webloid report. Gossip Cop can exclusively debunk this claim. We're told it's ` ` not true.'' ` ` Grammys Ruined For Adele! Singer Stranded Without Her Team,'' blares a new RadarOnline headline. The accompanying article goes on to purport that the singer is ` ` freaking out'' because she's alone in Los Angeles while her crew is snowed in out east.
